title: Echoes of the First Fall
goal: Kaelen uncovers ancient lore detailing a previous, similar threat, realizing the current crisis is not entirely unprecedented.

beats.summary: Driven by his vision and the oracle's silence, Kaelen discovers a hidden chamber within the Sanctum's deepest archives, containing forbidden scrolls.
The scrolls detail the 'First Fall,' an ancient conflict mirroring the current crisis, revealing a cyclical nature to the world's enduring threats.
Kaelen realizes the chilling parallels between the past and present, understanding that the Shadow Blight is merely a new manifestation of an old, persistent evil.
The texts hint at a forgotten weakness of this ancient foe and a costly, desperate defense that barely saved the world, suggesting a perilous path forward.
